languages.text: {n}Глаза Злобы затянуты полупрозрачным третьим веком. Голос его сонлив и вял.{/n} "Ты жив{mf||а}, людишко? Выходит, ты и впрямь что-то из себя представляешь, раз арена тебя пощадила. Что же, празднуй, отныне ты посвящен{mf||а} в Ревущие. Можешь претендовать на мои покровительство, убежище и снаряжение".

{n}Malice's translucent eyelid membranes are closed. His voice is drowsy and languid.{/n} "You alive, humanling? You really must be someone after all, if the arena spared you. Well, you should celebrate — from this day on, you're a Shrieker. My protection, shelter, and equipment are now yours to claim."
languages.original_text: {n}Глаза Злобы затянуты полупрозрачным третьим веком. Голос его сонлив и вял.{/n} "Ты жив{mf||а}, людишко? Выходит, ты и впрямь что-то из себя представляешь, раз арена тебя пощадила. Что же, празднуй, отныне ты посвящен{mf||а} в Ревущие. Можешь претендовать на мои покровительство, убежище и снаряжение".

Well, you should celebrate — from this day on, you're a Shrieker. My protection, shelter, and equipment are now yours to claim."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

Well, you should celebrate — from this day on, you're a Shrieker. My protection, shelter, and equipment are now yours to claim."

languages.text: {n}恶棍闭着半透明的皮膜。他的声音昏昏欲睡，无精打采。{/n}“你还活着吗，小人儿？你能从竞技场上活着下来，还挺真不简单的。很好，你可以庆祝一下了。因为从今天起，你就是尖啸者了。你可以得到住处、装备，以及我的庇护。”
languages.original_text: {n}Malice's translucent eyelid membranes are closed. His voice is drowsy and languid.{/n} "You alive, humanling? You really must be someone after all, if the arena spared you. Well, you should celebrate — from this day on, you're a Shrieker. My protection, shelter, and equipment are now yours to claim."

traits.locale_text: {n}恶棍闭着半透明的皮膜。他的声音昏昏欲睡，无精打采。{/n}“你还活着吗，小人儿？你能从竞技场上活着下来，还挺真不简单的。很好，你可以庆祝一下了。因为从今天起，你就是尖啸者了。你可以得到住处、装备，以及我的庇护。”
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: {n}Las membranas oculares translúcidas de Malicia están cerradas. Su voz es somnolienta y lánguida.{/n} «¿Sigues viv{mf|o|a}, human{mf|o|a}? Sí que debes de ser alguien especial si has salido de la arena. Bueno, esto hay que celebrarlo. Desde ahora, eres un{mf|o|a} de los Aulladores. Mi protección, mi cobijo y mi equipo están a tu disposición».
languages.original_text: {n}Malice's translucent eyelid membranes are closed. His voice is drowsy and languid.{/n} "You alive, humanling? You really must be someone after all, if the arena spared you. Well, you should celebrate — from this day on, you're a Shrieker. My protection, shelter, and equipment are now yours to claim."

traits.locale_text: {n}Las membranas oculares translúcidas de Malicia están cerradas. Su voz es somnolienta y lánguida.{/n} «¿Sigues viv{mf|o|a}, human{mf|o|a}? Sí que debes de ser alguien especial si has salido de la arena. Bueno, esto hay que celebrarlo. Desde ahora, eres un{mf|o|a} de los Aulladores. Mi protección, mi cobijo y mi equipo están a tu disposición».
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: {n}マリスの半透明の瞬膜は閉じている。彼は気だるそうな覇気のない声で話しかけてきた。{/n}「生きているか、人間？アリーナで生き延びるとは、なかなか骨のある奴らしいな。喜べ――今後、お前はシュリーカーとして生きる。私の保護も、シェルターも、装備も、すべて貴様のものだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Malice's translucent eyelid membranes are closed. His voice is drowsy and languid.{/n} "You alive, humanling? You really must be someone after all, if the arena spared you. Well, you should celebrate — from this day on, you're a Shrieker. My protection, shelter, and equipment are now yours to claim."

traits.locale_text: {n}マリスの半透明の瞬膜は閉じている。彼は気だるそうな覇気のない声で話しかけてきた。{/n}「生きているか、人間？アリーナで生き延びるとは、なかなか骨のある奴らしいな。喜べ――今後、お前はシュリーカーとして生きる。私の保護も、シェルターも、装備も、すべて貴様のものだ」
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: {n}Tückes durchscheinende Augenbrauenmembranen sind geschlossen. Seine Stimme ist schläfrig und träge.{/n} "Ihr lebt, Menschling? Ihr seid wohl doch nicht völlig unnütz, wenn die Arena Euch verschont hat. Nun, Ihr solltet feiern — von heute an gehört Ihr zu den Kreischern. Mein Schutz, meine Zuflucht und meine Ausrüstung gehören nun Euch."
languages.original_text: {n}Malice's translucent eyelid membranes are closed. His voice is drowsy and languid.{/n} "You alive, humanling? You really must be someone after all, if the arena spared you. Well, you should celebrate — from this day on, you're a Shrieker. My protection, shelter, and equipment are now yours to claim."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tückes durchscheinende Augenbrauenmembranen sind geschlossen. Seine Stimme ist schläfrig und träge.{/n} "Ihr lebt, Menschling? Ihr seid wohl doch nicht völlig unnütz, wenn die Arena Euch verschont hat. Nun, Ihr solltet feiern — von heute an gehört Ihr zu den Kreischern. Mein Schutz, meine Zuflucht und meine Ausrüstung gehören nun Euch."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: {n}Les paupières translucides de Démon sont fermées. Il parle d'une voix somnolente et léthargique.{/n} « Vous êtes en vie, {mf|humain|humaine} ? Vous ne devez pas être n'importe qui, finalement, si l'arène vous a {mf|épargné|épargnée}. Ma foi, vous devriez fêter ça : à compter de ce jour, vous êtes {mf|un Hurleur|une Hurleuse}. Vous pouvez désormais profiter de ma protection, de mon toit et de mon matériel. »
languages.original_text: {n}Malice's translucent eyelid membranes are closed. His voice is drowsy and languid.{/n} "You alive, humanling? You really must be someone after all, if the arena spared you. Well, you should celebrate — from this day on, you're a Shrieker. My protection, shelter, and equipment are now yours to claim."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les paupières translucides de Démon sont fermées. Il parle d'une voix somnolente et léthargique.{/n} « Vous êtes en vie, {mf|humain|humaine} ? Vous ne devez pas être n'importe qui, finalement, si l'arène vous a {mf|épargné|épargnée}. Ma foi, vous devriez fêter ça : à compter de ce jour, vous êtes {mf|un Hurleur|une Hurleuse}. Vous pouvez désormais profiter de ma protection, de mon toit et de mon matériel. »
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: {n}Melanet'in şeffaf göz kapakları kapalı duruyor. Sesi uykulu ve baygın çıkıyor.{/n} "Yaşıyor musun insancık? Arena sana merhamet ettiyse sahiden önemli biri olmalısın. Kutlama yaparsın artık, ne de olsa bugünden itibaren Çığırtkan olacaksın. Korunma, barınma ve teçhizat imkânları şahsımca sana bahşedilecek."
languages.original_text: {n}Malice's translucent eyelid membranes are closed. His voice is drowsy and languid.{/n} "You alive, humanling? You really must be someone after all, if the arena spared you. Well, you should celebrate — from this day on, you're a Shrieker. My protection, shelter, and equipment are now yours to claim."

traits.locale_text: {n}Melanet'in şeffaf göz kapakları kapalı vaziyette. Sesi uykulu ve baygın.{/n} "Yaşıyor musun insancık? Arena sana merhamet ettiyse sahiden önemli biri olmalısın. Ee, kutlama yaparsın artık. Ne de olsa bugünden itibaren Çığırtkan saflarına katılmış bulunmaktasın. Korunma, barınma ve teçhizat imkânları şahsımca sana bahşedilmiştir."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger
